name: ArenaPlay
description: ArenaPlay is a decentralised Sports, esports & crypto betting platform. We plan to offer a variety of services and features which will bring a plethora of benefits to both professional players/athletes & users alike. ArenaPlay rely on the industry of the Monaco competitive entertainment company SBM (Monte-Carlo Marina Resort Group), and taking the innovative blockchain entertainment model as its own responsibility, it is committed to building a chain for pan-entertainment industries such as games, quizzes, e-sports, NFT, and the Metaverse infrastructure. Our mission is to bring new cryptocurrency concepts to entertainment players in betting area. Different from centralized platform, we will bring our holders with fairness,sustainability and openness by decentralized gameplay. Itâ€™s 100% transparent.
